intfloat/multilingual-e5-large-instruct.name: Multilingual E5 Large Instruct
intfloat/multilingual-e5-large-instruct.description: Multilingual E5 text embeddings, large-sized model (560M parameters) with instruction-following capabilities. Top performer on MTEB leaderboard. Supports 100+ languages.

BAAI/bge-large-en.name: BGE Large English
BAAI/bge-large-en.description: BGE (BAAI General Embedding) model, large-sized (335M parameters). High quality English text embeddings with excellent performance on retrieval tasks.

BAAI/bge-small-en-v1.5.name: BGE Small English v1.5
BAAI/bge-small-en-v1.5.description: BGE (BAAI General Embedding) model, small-sized (33M parameters). Fast and efficient English text embeddings with good performance for most use cases.

thenlper/gte-large.name: GTE Large
thenlper/gte-large.description: General Text Embeddings (GTE) model, large-sized (335M parameters). Strong performance on text similarity and retrieval tasks.

thenlper/gte-base.name: GTE Base
thenlper/gte-base.description: General Text Embeddings (GTE) model, base-sized (110M parameters). Historically used in Obrew Studio. Good balance of performance and efficiency.

thenlper/gte-small.name: GTE Small
thenlper/gte-small.description: General Text Embeddings (GTE) model, small-sized (33M parameters). Fast and lightweight for resource-constrained environments.

sentence-transformers/all-MiniLM-L6-v2.name: All MiniLM L6 v2
sentence-transformers/all-MiniLM-L6-v2.description: Popular sentence-transformers model (22M parameters). Very fast and lightweight, suitable for semantic similarity and clustering tasks.
